mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATES , S.S_NAME , O.MILEAGE FROM ORDERS O JOIN STORE S ON O.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE O.C_ID = #{cId} ORDER BY DATES DESC

SELECT SUM(ORL.TOTALRE) TOTO, SUM(ORL.USERE) UUU, SUM(ORL.TOTALRE)-SUM(ORL.USERE) RERE FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(RE.MILEAGE)+DD.MILEAGE ,0) TOTALRE, NVL(SUM(RE.MILEAGE),0) USERE FROM RESERVE RE , (SELECT S_ID, C_ID, SUM(MILEAGE) MILEAGE FROM ORDERS WHERE C_ID= #{cId} GROUP BY S_ID, C_ID ) DD WHERE RE.C_ID= #{cId} GROUP BY DD.MILEAGE ) ORL
